Translations.Text: Fe la uksimu bi mevakiin nucum(nucumi)
Ve innehu le kasemun lev ta’lemune azim(azimun)
Innehu le kur’anun kerim(kerimun)
Fi kitabin meknun(meknunin)
La yemessuhu illel mutahherun(mutahherune)
Tenzilun min rabbil alemin(alemine)
E fe bi hazel hadisi entum mudhinun(mudhinune)
Ve tec’alune rızkakum ennekum tukezzibun(tukezzibune)
Fe lev la iza belegatil hulkume(hulkume)
Ve entum hine izin tenzurun(tenzurune)
Ve nahnu akrebu ileyhi minkum ve lakin la tubsirun(tubsirune)
Fe lev la in kuntum gayre medinin(medinine)
Terciuneha in kuntum sadikin(sadikine)
Fe emma in kane minel mukarrebine(mukarrebine)
Fe revhun ve reyhanun ve cennetu naim(naimin)
Ve emma in kane min ashabil yemin(yemini)
Fe selamun leke min ashabil yemin(yemini)
Ve emma in kane minel mukezzibined dallin(dalline)
Fe nuzulun min hamim(hamimin)
Ve tasliyetu cahim(cahimin)
Inne haza le huve hakkul yakin(yakini)
Fe sebbih bismi rabbikel azim(azimi)
